title: L&T Finance Holdings drops after CitiGroup and CBNA London offload 5% stake - Business Standard
content: L&T Finance Holdings drops after CitiGroup and CBNA London offload 5% stake  Business Standard
description: L&T Finance Holdings tumbled 7.60% to Rs 64.45 after CitiGroup Global Markets Mauritius and CBNA London sold 6.39 crore equity shares or 4.88% stake of the company on 21 February 2022.
